meanings.definition: The state or rank of being a cardinal.
meanings.sent1: In the Vatican, only a few individuals hold cardinalships.
meanings.sent2: The cardinalships in the Catholic Church are prestigious positions.
meanings.sent3: The cardinalships were so sought after that even the pigeons in the square wanted them.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work elevated him to the cardinalships of the organization.
meanings.sent5: The cardinalships shone brightly in the hierarchy of the church.

meanings.definition: The office or position of a cardinal.
meanings.sent1: The cardinalships play a crucial role in the church's administration.
meanings.sent2: He aspired to attain one of the esteemed cardinalships in his career.
meanings.sent3: The cardinalships had their own secret handshake that only they knew.
meanings.sent4: She navigated the complex world of politics to reach the highest cardinalships.
meanings.sent5: The cardinalships stood out like beacons of authority in the religious institution.
